actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services, and in addition to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Armed Services, and in addition to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation

official_title: To prohibit the use of Federal funds for any DEI activity in the Armed Forces, and for other purposes.
short_title: Eliminate DEI in the Military Act

summary.text:
Eliminate DEI in the Military Act

This bill prohibits the use of federal funds for diversity, equity, and inclusion activities (e.g., training) of the Armed Forces, national service academies, or the Department of Defense.

titles.title: Eliminate DEI in the Military Act

To prohibit the use of Federal funds for any DEI activity in the Armed Forces, and for other purposes.
